name: Jingle Bell - Christmas
description:
Jingle Bells Simulator is app for fun and entertainment as we all have in Christmas times with Santa clause so we called this app all time Christmas Fever.

We have 3 types of bells in this app
1. Jingle Bells
2. Sleigh Bell
3. Temple Bell and Hand Bell

How to Play this Bells
1. Open Application
2. Tap on Bells you want to Play
3. Shake your Device

You can ring bells along with karaoke version of Jingle bell .
